page.title: 08MY SCHOOL
page.content:
THE NAME OF MY SCHOOL IS CHURNET VIEW MIDDLE SCHOOL. IT IS A FAIRLY NEW SCHOOL AS IT HAS ONLY BEEN BUILT FOR FOUR YEARS. THERE ARE ABOUT SIX HUNDRED CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL AGED NINE TO THIRTEEN YEARS.
THE CHILDREN ALL COME FROM DIFFERENT AREAS IN AND AROUND LEEK. MANY OF THE CHILDREN HAVE TO COME TO SCHOOL BY SPECIAL BUSES AS THEY LIVE MANY MILES AWAY FROM SCHOOL IN THE SURROUNDING COUNTRYSIDE. BEFORE THEY COME TO CHURNET VIEW MANY OF THE CHILDREN HAVE ONLY BEEN TO A SMALL VILLAGE SCHOOL AND ARE OFTEN SURPRISED AT THE SIZE OF THE SCHOOL BUT THEY SOON GET USED TO IT.IN THE WINTER IF WE HAVE A LOT OF SNOW THE CHILDREN FROM THE COUNTRY HAVE TO GO HOME EARLY SO THAT THEY DON'T GET STRANDED IN TOWN
